Rulings.Edison: ●While you control 2 copies of this card, a battling monster with 1 A-Counter will lose 600 ATK/DEF.
Rulings.Tengu: ●While you control 2 copies of this card, a battling monster with 1 A-Counter will lose 600 ATK/DEF.

Rulings.Cat:
● The effect to reduce the ATK of monsters with A-Counters is an effect of this card. If this card (or another with the same effect) isn't on the field, then a monster with an A-Counter will not lose ATK while battling an 'Alien'.
● If 2 'Alien Grey' (or other monsters with the A-Counter text) are on the field, then a monster with 1 A-Counter will lose 600 ATK while battling an 'Alien'.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to reduce the ATK of monsters with A-Counters is an effect of this card. If this card (or another with the same effect) is not on the field, then a monster with an A-Counter will not lose ATK while battling an "Alien".\n2. If 2 "Alien Grey" (or other monsters with the A-Counter text) are on the field, then a monster with 1 A-Counter will lose 600 ATK while battling an "Alien".

PSCT.Edison:
① FLIP: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; place 1 A-Counter on that target.
② Monsters with A-Counters lose 300 ATK/DEF for each A-Counter on them, while battling an 'Alien' monster, during Damage Calculation only.
③ After this card has been flipped face-up, if it is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Draw 1 card.
PSCT.Tengu:
① FLIP: Place 1 A-Counter on 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.
② Monsters with A-Counters lose 300 ATK/DEF for each A-Counter on them, while battling an 'Alien' monster, during Damage Calculation only.
③ After this card has been flipped face-up, if it is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Draw 1 card.
